name: generator-express
description: A nodejs express generator for Yeoman

scripts.test:generate: npm link && npm run test:generate:basic && npm run test:generate:mvc
scripts.test:generate:basic: mkdir temp; cd temp && yo express --createDirectory true --dirname one --basic true --viewEngine handlebars --cssPreprocessor css --buildTool gulp && cd one && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:generate:mvc: mkdir temp; cd temp && yo express --createDirectory true --dirname two --mvc true --viewEngine handlebars --cssPreprocessor css --database sqlite --buildTool gulp && cd two && npm run test:coverage
